author: Be Smart
description:
Remove your personal information from the web at http://joindeleteme.com/BESMART and use code BESMART for 20% off
↓↓↓ More info and sources below ↓↓↓

Follow us over to the PBS App or PBS.org to watch Walking with Dinosaurs!
https://to.pbs.org/WalkingWithDinosaurs

How did dinosaurs become birds—and what good is half a wing? Join Joe and a few brave chickens as they recreate a brilliant experiment that helps solve one of evolution’s greatest mysteries: the origin of feathered flight.

Thank you to Dr. Jingmai O'Connor from Chicago's Field Museum for helpful discussions and background research

Sources: https://sites.google.com/view/from-feathers-to-flight/home

title: The Dinosaur Dilemma That Darwin Couldn’t Solve
